articles.title: Biden makes surprise trip to Kyiv before invasion anniversary - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: US President Joe Biden on Monday made a trip to Kyiv organised in strict secrecy, promising $500 million in fresh arms deliveries and "unwavering" American support ahead of the first anniversary of Russia's invasion.
